<title> </title>  

<p>Newton Adventure is a free and open source 2D platform game. You play Newton, a very special hero who has the power to change gravity direction.</p>
<p>It runs on every Linux, Windows, Mac OS X or any OS with Java and OpenGL support.</p>
<p><small>Code is available under BSD licence, data under CC-BY-SA or more permissive licences.</small></p>
<p>[Donation] or people wanting to [Contribute] to the game development are welcome.</p>
